content: pink pop by karin fernandes for beautiful knitters yarn pattern begins 1 skein 50g/ 224 metres of beautiful knitters camden dk 100% cashmere the sample is knit with smaller size 3 5 mm us 4 needles using long in colour pink pop tail cast on method loosely co 114 sts place a unique marker and join for working in the round sizes being careful not to twist the stitches one size rounds 1 - 3 k all sts finished circumference 51 cm/ 20 inches finished length 27 cm/ 10 5 inches change to larger 4 mm/ us 6 needles next round p all sts needles & notions 3 5 mm/ us 4 40 cm/ 16 inches long circular round 1 *yo p2tog p4 repeat from * to end of needles round 4 mm/ us 6 40 cm/ 16 inches long circular round 2 *k1 p5 repeat from * to end of round needles rounds 3 6 repeat round 2 1 stitch marker round 7 *p3 yo p2tog p1 repeat from * to end of tapestry needle round round 8 *p3 k1 p2 repeat from * to end of round gauge rounds 9 12 repeat round 8 22 sts in 10 cm using 4 mm/ us 6 needles repeat rounds 1 to 12 6 more times pattern notes the cowl is knit in the round the circumference repeat rounds 1 to 6 once more can be adjusted by adding multiple of 6 stitches next round p all sts abreviations finish bobble bind off change to smaller 3 5 mm/ us 4 needles co cast on round 1 - 3 k all sts k knit k2tog-tbl knit 2 stitches together through back with larger 4 mm/ us 6 needles loosely bobble all sts loop using stretchy bind off as follows k2 slip last two lhn left hand needle sts on rhn back to lhn k2tog-tbl *k1 slip last p purl two sts on rhn back to lhn k2tog-tbl repeat from * p2tog purl 2 stitches together to end repeat repeat rhn right hand needle weave in the ends and block as desired enjoy st s stitch es yo yarn over for more patterns visit our website www beautifulknitters co uk or visit our shop in the heart of london uk beautiful knitters 53 moreton street london sw1 2ny all images and text © beautiful knitters 2023
